accept.description: The file types, image/gif image/jpeg image/jpg image/png
accept.description_zh: The file types, image/gif image/jpeg image/jpg image/png

beforeUpload.description: Callback function before file reading, return null to terminate file reading, support return Promise
beforeUpload.description_zh: Callback function before file reading, return null to terminate file reading, support return Promise
beforeUpload.type: (file: File, files: File[]) => Promise<File | null> | File | null

capture.description: Picture selection mode, the optional value is camera (directly adjust the camera)
capture.description_zh: Picture selection mode, the optional value is camera (directly adjust the camera)

deletable.description: Whether to show the delete button
deletable.description_zh: Whether to show the delete button

deleteIcon.description: The customized icon in delete button
deleteIcon.description_zh: The customized icon in delete button

disableUpload.description: Whether to disable the upload button
disableUpload.description_zh: Whether to disable the upload button

imageFit.description: The fill mode of the image, same as Image
imageFit.description_zh: The fill mode of the image, same as Image

maxCount.description: To control how many pictures to be uploaded at most, the upload button would be automatically hidden if the number is exceeded, 0 means no limit
maxCount.description_zh: To control how many pictures to be uploaded at most, the upload button would be automatically hidden if the number is exceeded, 0 means no limit

multiple.description: Whether to support selecting multiple pictures
multiple.description_zh: Whether to support selecting multiple pictures

showFailed.description: Whether to display pictures in the failed uploading state
showFailed.description_zh: Whether to display pictures in the failed uploading state

showUpload.description: Whether to display the upload button
showUpload.description_zh: Whether to display the upload button

upload.description: Upload method, the input parameter is the file object that needs to be uploaded, after asynchronous processing, the upload result is returned
upload.description_zh: Upload method, the input parameter is the file object that needs to be uploaded, after asynchronous processing, the upload result is returned

renderItem.type: (originNode: React.ReactElement, file: ImageUploadItem, fileList: ImageUploadItem[] ) => React.ReactNode

events.name: onChange
events.description: Triggered when the list of uploaded files changing
events.description_zh: Triggered when the list of uploaded files changing

events.name: onCountExceed
events.description: Triggered when the number of pictures selected by the user exceeds the maximum limit
events.description_zh: Triggered when the number of pictures selected by the user exceeds the maximum limit

events.name: onDelete
events.description: Triggered when the successfully uploaded image is deleted, if it returns false, it means that it is prevented from being deleted, and it supports the return of Promise.
events.description_zh: Triggered when the successfully uploaded image is deleted, if it returns false, it means that it is prevented from being deleted, and it supports the return of Promise.

events.name: onPreview
events.description: Callback when the preview picture is clicked
events.description_zh: Callback when the preview picture is clicked

events.name: onUploadQueueChange
events.description: Triggered when the image upload queue changes
events.description_zh: Triggered when the image upload queue changes
